text: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيْهِمْ ظِلَـٰلُهَا وَذُلِّلَتْ قُطُوفُهَا تَذْلِيلًا

translation.en.sahih: And near above them are its shades, and its [fruit] to be picked will be lowered in compliance.
translation.id.indonesian: Dan naungan (pohon-pohon surga itu) dekat di atas mereka dan buahnya dimudahkan memetiknya semudah-mudahnya.
